com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenDrawListener


  • public interface SpenDrawListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen draw events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDraw(Canvas canvas, float x, float y, float ratio, float frameStartX, float frameStartY, RectF updateRect)
      Called when a drawing event is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • onDraw

        void onDraw(Canvas canvas,
          float x,
          float y,
          float ratio,
          float frameStartX,
          float frameStartY,
          RectF updateRect)
        Called when a drawing event is completed.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas on which the drawing occurs.
        x - The current X coordinate.
        y - The current Y coordinate.
        ratio - The zoom ratio.
        frameStartX - The starting canvas X coordinate for the drawing.
        frameStartY - The starting canvas Y coordinate for the drawing.
        updateRect - The rect for the update.
